'''Pink petals''' are a decorative block that generates in [[cherry grove]] biomes.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Pink petals can be [[instant mining|broken instantly]] with any [[item]] or by hand.

{{breaking row|Pink Petals|horizontal=1}}

Pink petals are also removed and drop as an item if:
* its attachment block is moved, removed, or destroyed.
* water or lava flows into its space.
* a piston tries to push it or moves a block into its space.
* it is placed on a mud block, and that mud block converts to clay.
The amount of pink petal items dropped is equal to how many were present in the block space beforehand (i.e. a pink petal block with 3 placed will drop 3 pink petal items when destroyed).

=== Natural generation ===
Pink petals generate naturally in [[cherry grove]]s.

If a village should appear in a cherry grove biome, it is possible for the petals to be growing on [[dirt path]] blocks, similar to [[short grass]].
{{Block distribution}}

=== Post-generation ===
Each time [[bone meal]] is applied to pink petals, the number of petals in the block increases by 1. If there are already four pink petals in the block, it drops a copy of itself, similar to tall flowers.

Pink petals also generate when bone meal is applied to a [[grass block]] in cherry groves.{{Only|Java|short=y}}<ref>{{bug|MCPE-168074||Using Bone meal in Cherry Grove does not grow Pink Petals}}</ref>

== Usage ==
A pink petal may be placed on [[grass block]]s, [[podzol]], [[mycelium]], [[dirt]], [[coarse dirt]], [[rooted dirt]], [[moss block]]s, [[mud]], [[muddy mangrove roots]], or [[farmland]]. Pink petals are used for decoration, and can be crafted into [[pink dye]].

More than one pink petal can be placed on a block, similar to other blocks such as [[sea pickle]]s and [[candle]]s. Up to four pink petals can be placed in a group on one block. 

[[Sheep]] can consume the grass under pink petals without breaking the petals.

Unlike [[leaf litter]], pink petals cannot be used as [[fuel]] in a [[furnace]].

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{Crafting
|head=1
|showname=0
|Pink Petals
|Output=Pink Dye
|type=Material
|foot=1
}}

=== Bees ===
[[Bee]]s can pollinate pink petals like other flowers. They can also be [[bred]] using pink petals.

=== Bee nests ===
[[Oak]], [[birch]], and [[cherry]] trees grown from [[sapling]]s that are within 2 blocks of pink petals have a 5% chance to grow with a [[bee nest]] and 2-3 [[bee]]s in it.

=== Composting ===
Placing pink petals into a [[composter]] has a 30% chance of raising the compost level by 1.
